verses.kjv: Behold, what manner of love the Father hath bestowed upon us, that we should be called the sons of God: therefore the world knoweth us not, because it knew him not.
verses.ct: Look at how incredible the love is that the Father has given to us — that we would be called children of God! And that's exactly what we are. The reason the world doesn't recognize us is that it never recognized him either.

verses.kjv: Beloved, now are we the sons of God, and it doth not yet appear what we shall be: but we know that, when he shall appear, we shall be like him; for we shall see him as he is.
verses.ct: Dear friends, right now we are already God's children, but what we will ultimately become hasn't been revealed yet. What we do know is that when he appears, we will be transformed to be like him, because we will see him exactly as he is.

verses.kjv: And every man that hath this hope in him purifieth himself, even as he is pure.
verses.ct: Everyone who holds on to this hope in him works to make themselves pure, just as he is pure.

verses.kjv: Whosoever committeth sin transgresseth also the law: for sin is the transgression of the law.
verses.ct: Whoever practices sin is also breaking God's law, because sin is the violation of God's law.

verses.kjv: And ye know that he was manifested to take away our sins; and in him is no sin.
verses.ct: You know that he came into the world to remove our sins, and there is absolutely no sin in him.

verses.kjv: Whosoever abideth in him sinneth not: whosoever sinneth hath not seen him, neither known him.
verses.ct: No one who remains in him keeps on sinning. Anyone who keeps sinning has never truly seen him or known him.

verses.kjv: Little children, let no man deceive you: he that doeth righteousness is righteous, even as he is righteous.
verses.ct: Dear children, don't let anyone mislead you. The person who practices righteousness is righteous, just as Christ is righteous.

verses.kjv: He that committeth sin is of the devil; for the devil sinneth from the beginning. For this purpose the Son of God was manifested, that he might destroy the works of the devil.
verses.ct: The person who practices sin belongs to the devil, because the devil has been sinning from the very start. This is the reason the Son of God appeared — to tear apart everything the devil has done.

verses.kjv: Whosoever is born of God doth not commit sin; for his seed remaineth in him: and he cannot sin, because he is born of God.
verses.ct: No one who is born of God makes a habit of sinning, because God's nature lives inside them. They cannot go on sinning, because they have been born of God.

verses.kjv: In this the children of God are manifest, and the children of the devil: whosoever doeth not righteousness is not of God, neither he that loveth not his brother.
verses.ct: This is how you can tell the difference between God's children and the devil's children: anyone who does not practice righteousness does not belong to God, and neither does anyone who fails to love their brother or sister.

verses.kjv: For this is the message that ye heard from the beginning, that we should love one another.
verses.ct: This is the core message you've heard from the very beginning: we should love each other.

verses.kjv: Not as Cain, who was of that wicked one, and slew his brother. And wherefore slew he him? Because his own works were evil, and his brother’s righteous.
verses.ct: Don't be like Cain, who belonged to the evil one and killed his brother. Why did he kill him? Because his own actions were evil, while his brother's were righteous.

verses.kjv: Marvel not, my brethren, if the world hate you.
verses.ct: Brothers and sisters, don't be surprised when the world hates you.

verses.kjv: We know that we have passed from death unto life, because we love the brethren. He that loveth not his brother abideth in death.
verses.ct: We know that we have crossed over from death into life, because we love our brothers and sisters. Anyone who doesn't love remains trapped in death.

verses.kjv: Whosoever hateth his brother is a murderer: and ye know that no murderer hath eternal life abiding in him.
verses.ct: Whoever hates a brother or sister is a murderer at heart, and you know that no murderer has eternal life living inside them.

verses.kjv: Hereby perceive we the love of God, because he laid down his life for us: and we ought to lay down our lives for the brethren.
verses.ct: This is how we understand what love really is: he sacrificed his life for us. So we should be willing to sacrifice our lives for our brothers and sisters.

verses.kjv: But whoso hath this world’s good, and seeth his brother have need, and shutteth up his bowels of compassion from him, how dwelleth the love of God in him?
verses.ct: If someone has plenty of material possessions and sees a brother or sister in need but refuses to feel compassion for them, how can God's love possibly be living in that person?

verses.kjv: My little children, let us not love in word, neither in tongue; but in deed and in truth.
verses.ct: Dear children, our love must not be limited to words and talk. It needs to show up in our actions and be grounded in truth.

verses.kjv: And hereby we know that we are of the truth, and shall assure our hearts before him.
verses.ct: This is how we'll know that we belong to the truth, and how we can put our hearts at ease in his presence.

verses.kjv: For if our heart condemn us, God is greater than our heart, and knoweth all things.
verses.ct: Even if our own hearts accuse us, God is greater than our hearts, and he knows everything.

verses.kjv: Beloved, if our heart condemn us not, then have we confidence toward God.
verses.ct: Dear friends, if our hearts don't accuse us, we can approach God with complete confidence.

verses.kjv: And whatsoever we ask, we receive of him, because we keep his commandments, and do those things that are pleasing in his sight.
verses.ct: Whatever we ask, we receive from him, because we follow his commands and do what pleases him.

verses.kjv: And this is his commandment, That we should believe on the name of his Son Jesus Christ, and love one another, as he gave us commandment.
verses.ct: This is his command: that we put our trust in the name of his Son Jesus Christ, and that we love one another, just as he instructed us.

verses.kjv: And he that keepeth his commandments dwelleth in him, and he in him. And hereby we know that he abideth in us, by the Spirit which he hath given us.
verses.ct: The person who follows his commands remains in God, and God remains in them. This is how we know that he lives in us — through the Spirit that he has given us.
